mapper.update: update reply set reply_text=#{reply_text} where idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from reply where board_idx=#{board_idx}

select idx,board_idx,reply_text,replyer,name,r.regdate, (select writer from board where idx=r.board_idx) writer from reply r, member m where r.replyer=m.userid and board_idx=#{board_idx} order by idx desc
